moves: 1. d4 h6 2. e4 d6 3. Nc3 a6 4. f4 b5 5. Nf3 Bb7 6. Bd3 c5 7. dxc5 dxc5 8. b3 g5
comment:
#(A typical
Basman move, fights for e5, clears the h-file and gets the Bishop to g7, here
with tempi on Ktc3.)

moves: 1. d4 h6 2. e4 d6 3. Nc3 a6 4. f4 b5 5. Nf3 Bb7 6. Bd3 c5 7. dxc5 dxc5 8. b3 g5 9. fxg5 Bg7 10. Bb2 hxg5 11. Nxg5 Nd7 12. Qf3 Bf6
comment: (To forestall 0-0-0 and tell Ktg5 not to be too optimistic about f7.)

moves: 1. d4 h6 2. e4 d6 3. Nc3 a6 4. f4 b5 5. Nf3 Bb7 6. Bd3 c5 7. dxc5 dxc5 8. b3 g5 9. fxg5 Bg7 10. Bb2 hxg5 11. Nxg5 Nd7 12. Qf3 Bf6 13. Nd5 Bxd5 14. exd5 Qa5+
comment:
(That came in handy. the game already plays itself in
that there is no going back on heavy measures.)
